text: Keith George Sebelius (September 10, 1916 â€“ August 5, 1982) was an American politician. He was in the United States House of Representatives as a Republican, representing Kansas from 1969 until 1981. Sebelius died at a hospital in Norton, Kansas on August 5, 1982 from prostate cancer at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Kansas Republicans Category:United States representatives from Kansas Category:Cancer deaths in Kansas Category:Deaths from prostate cancer
title: Keith Sebelius
